This led to the exposure of several fraudulent psychics who were unable to produce the required message. By doing this, Bess effectively showed that many psychics were not genuine and were just exploiting people's beliefs for money.

So, putting it all together, Bess Houdini did play a role in making psychics look foolish by continuing her husband's challenge. She exposed many frauds, which in turn made the general public more skeptical of psychics' claims.
